title: Homepage
content: Homepage [!empty] nin827 (Nin) MB001 Hello, I like novelty stuff — interesting and intriguing. > project.owner | project.lead | illustrator.icon | illustrator.thumbnail | writer.story | writer.profile > Main Website, Tumblr, Facebook [!empty] Project NS22 This project, New Siam 22th Century, or NS22, is a novel project involving Bangkok, Thailand, in a speculative 22th century setting involving mutual coexistence between humans and androids as the central theme. This also covers the idea of sapient AIs interweaving into human-driven society. Assume that the narrative starts on 2120s. Hello, this website is currently under construction. More content to come slowly, but surely. Portfolio Index Illustration: Thumbnails Illustration: Thumbnails 2 Illustration: Sample Illustration: Study Illustration: Bonus Preview

title: Project NS22
content: Overview [!empty] Project NS22 This project, New Siam 22th Century, or NS22, is a novel project involving Bangkok, Thailand, in a speculative 22th century setting involving mutual coexistence between humans and androids as the central theme. This also covers the idea of sapient AIs interweaving into human-driven society. Assume that the narrative starts on 2120s. Read more at nin827's Project NS22 Remarks for more details. (Coming soon) Contributors [!empty] nin827 (Nin) MB001 Hello, I like novelty stuff — interesting and intriguing. > project.owner | project.lead | illustrator.icon | illustrator.thumbnail | writer.story | writer.profile > Main Website, Tumblr, Facebook [!empty] Cheeramisuu (Chee) MB002 Miso Soup fueled Artist, boiled well-done since 1998. > illustrator.icon > ArtStation Articles ... Characters ... Elements ...

title: Illustration
content:
Coming soon.
^preview

title: Illustration: Bonus
content:
Projects
Book 1

[!info]
Project planned for the future — to be worked as introductory piece of the project.

Book 2

[!info]
Project planned for the future — to be worked concurrent with book 1 past halfway point.

Book 3

[!info]
Project planned for the future — to be worked as explorative piece, but only after the project foundation and momentum has been properly set.

Other

[!info]
No solid plans — either can be side projects, secret projects, or something else.

Miscellaneous

title: Illustration: Thumbnails
content:
Background based on BTS E5 Phrom Phong, near Em shopping district.

Simple practice illustration.

Illustration based on 1st novel project.

Background based on CentralwOrld driveway into the parking spot, heavily modified to fit the composition.

Practice illustration — initially was made to be based on a character from 2nd novel project, but was later scrapped to perspective practice.

Practice illustration of a canal bridge near the university premises.

Practice illustration of a generic laundromat (within my university) during my undergraduate studies.

Background based on BTS E12 Udom Suk, on empty residential land beside the street.

Illustration based on 3rd novel project — for the later low-priority project. It was meant to be 1st novel, but switched up to be as 3rd.

title: Illustration: Thumbnail 2
content:
Practice illustration of a skeleton conducting a (magical) orchestra — something to fill up the illustration portfolio.

Practice illustration focusing on 1P perspective study.

Illustration based on 1st novel project.

Illustration based on 1st novel project.

Practice illustration of which doubles as world building.

Illustration based on 1st novel project.

Practice illustration — initially was made to be based on a character from 2nd novel project, but was later scrapped to perspective practice.

Practice illustration on basic dynamic motion/flow, made during early years.

Illustration for fun mini-project — either will never be made, or as far future but with low priority.

Practice illustration of a suburban area — incorporating complex 4P perspective. Admittedly, there are some alignment errors if viewed under scrutinizing lens.
